scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

scripts.test:cordova:v7: npm run install:cordova:v7 && npm run test:ios:v4 && npm run test:android:v7 && npm run test:browser:v5
scripts.test:cordova:v8: npm run install:cordova:v8 && npm run test:ios:v4 && npm run test:android:v7 && npm run test:browser:v5
scripts.install:cordova:v6: npm uninstall cordova && npm install cordova@^6.x.x --no-save
scripts.install:cordova:v7: npm uninstall cordova && npm install cordova@^7.x.x --no-save
scripts.install:cordova:v8: npm uninstall cordova && npm install cordova@^8.x.x --no-save
